name: Knockout
note:
State #1 will be automatically added when
HP reaches 0.

name: Burn
note:
Does 10 HP at turn end and 2 HP per move.
Does 10 Damage on apply.
<Category: debuff>
<Custom Apply Effect>
a.gainHp(-10);
</Custom Apply Effect>

name: Soak
Poison
Confuse
Daze
note:
All new buff 1 turn shorter.
Lose 1 buff on apply.
<Category: debuff>
<Custom Apply Effect>
this.removeStateCategory('buff', 1);
</Custom Apply Effect>

name: Curse
Immoblize
note:
Can't Move.
All EVA is ignored.
Lose all Mobile Evasion on apply.
<Category: debuff>
<Custom Apply Effect>
a.clearMobileEvasion();
</Custom Apply Effect>

name: Disable
note:
Can't Attack.
<Category: debuff>

name: Explode
note:
<Custom React Effect>
if (b.hp - value < 1){
  var entity = b.getEntity();
  var center = entity.getCell().toCoords();    
  var param = BattleManagerTBS.makeObjScopeParam(null,entity,center);
  var cells = BattleManagerTBS.makeCircleScope(center,1,null,param);
  cells = cells.filter(function (cell) {return cell.isThereEntity() && cell.getEntity()!=null;});
  var targets = cells.map(function(e){return e.getEntity()});
  for(var i = 0; i < targets.length; i++){
    targets[i].newAnimation(1, false, 0);
    BattleManagerTBS.applyFloatingDamage(b.atk, targets[i]);
  }
}
</Custom React Effect>

loop_animation: 179

name: BEAST
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
user._prevCharName = user._characterName;
user._prevCharIndex = user._characterIndex;
user._prevFaceName = user._faceName;
user._prevFaceIndex = user._faceIndex;
user._prevBattlerName = user._battlerName;
user.setCharacterImage('hero07',0);
user.setFaceImage('hero7',7);
user.setBattlerImage('BEAST!');
user.getEntity().applyFilenameChange();
</Custom Apply Effect>
<Custom Remove Effect>
user.setCharacterImage(user._prevCharName,user._prevCharIndex);
user.setFaceImage(user._prevFaceName,user._prevFaceIndex);
user.setBattlerImage(user._prevBattlerName);
user._prevCharName = user._prevCharIndex = user._prevFaceName = user._prevFaceIndex = user._prevBattlerName = undefined;
user.getEntity().applyFilenameChange();
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: Quiver
note:
<Custom Battle Effect>
var get = a.getStateCounter(26)||0;
var ammo = a.isStateAffected(24) ? 4 : 3;
a.setStateCounter(26, ammo);
</Custom Battle Effect>
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
var get = user.getStateCounter(26)||0;
var ammo = user.isStateAffected(24) ? 6 : 5;
if (user.tpRate() >= 0.75) {
  user.setStateCounter(26, Math.min(get+1,ammo));
}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: Backstab
note:
<Category: attachment>
<Custom Confirm Effect>
var atkskill = [101,103,105];
for(var i = 0; i < atkskill.length; i++){
  if(this._item._itemId === atkskill[i] && target.attackedFrom()=="back"){
    value *= 2;
    break;
  }
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

name: Armor
note:
<Custom React Effect>
var get = b.mp;
if(this.isPhysical() && get>0 && value>0){
  if(value < get * 0.1){value = 0;}
  var overflow = (value - get).toFixed();
  b.getEntity().addTextIconPopup("-"+Math.min(value,get),0,39);
  get = Math.max(0, -overflow);
  value = Math.max(0, overflow);
  b.setMp(get);
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: Magazine
note:
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
var get = a.getStateCounter(30)||0;
var ammo = a.isStateAffected(24) ? 7 : 5;
if (user.tpRate() >= 0.75) {
  a.setStateCounter(30, Math.min(get+1,ammo));
}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: Force
note: <Category: attachment>

name: Hook
note: <Category: attachment>

name: Stable
note:
<Category: attachment>
<Custom Initiate Effect>
var atkskill = [101,103,105,112,116];
for(var i = 0; i < atkskill.length; i++){
  if(this._item._itemId === atkskill[i]){
    a.setTempStat("hit",["is33",0.20]);
    break;
  }
}
</Custom Initiate Effect>
<Custom Establish Effect>
a.setTempStat("hit",["is33",0.0]);
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: Rush
note:
<Category: attachment>
<Custom Confirm Effect>
var atkskill = [101,103,105];
for(var i = 0; i < atkskill.length; i++){
  if(this._item._itemId === atkskill[i]){
    var get = a.getStateCounter(34)||0;
    value += a.atk * 0.2 * get;
    value = Math.floor(value);
    a.setStateCounter(34, 0);
    break;
  }
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

note: <Category: attachment>

}

name: Block
note:
<Custom React Effect>
var cost = a.skillTpCost(this.item())||0;
if(this.isPhysical() && b.attackedFrom()=="front" && cost <= b.tp){
  b.gainTp(-cost);
  b.getEntity().newAnimation(264, false, 0);
  b.getEntity().addTextIconPopup("Block -"+cost,63,4);
  value = 0;
}
</Custom React Effect>
<Custom Passive Condition>
if (user.tpRate() >= 0.5) {
  condition = true;
} else {
  condition = false;
}
</Custom Passive Condition>

name: Mana Shield
note:
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
var get = a.getStateCounter(40)||0;
a.setStateCounter(40, get+10);
</Custom Turn Start Effect>
<Custom React Effect>
var get = b.getStateCounter(40)||0;
if(get>0 && value>0){
  if(value < get * 0.1){value = 0;}
  var overflow = value - get;
  b.getEntity().addTextIconPopup("-"+Math.min(value,get),0,653);
  get = Math.max(0, -overflow);
  value = Math.max(0, overflow);
  b.setStateCounter(40, get);
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: Samurai
note:

  var get = a.getStateCounter(54)||0;
  a.setStateCounter(54, Math.min(get+1,8));
}
</Custom Turn End Effect>
<Custom Respond Effect>

b.setStateCounter(54, Math.min(get+1,8));
</Custom Respond Effect>
<Custom Deselect Effect>
var debuff = b.justAddedBD('debuff');
while(debuff.length > 0){
  var state = debuff.pop();
  if(state.id===8){
    b.addState(19);
  }
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

name: Vampire
note:
<Custom Confirm Effect>
if(value > 0 && a.hpRate() < 1){
  var dizzy = b.isStateAffected(5) ? 0.40 : 0.20;
  var vampire = Math.round(Math.min(value*dizzy,b.hp) * 1e0) / 1e0;
  a.gainHp(vampire);
  a.getEntity().addTextIconPopup("+"+vampire,0,54);
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

name: Monk
note:
<Custom Respond Effect>
if(value && !b.isStateAffected(15) && b.isStateAffected(16)){
  a.setHp(a.hp - b.atk);
  a.getEntity().addTextIconPopup("-"+b.atk,0,54);
  if(a.hp < 1) a.setHp(1);
  b.removeState(16);
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

  user.addState(16);
}

name: Inquisitor
note:

var debuff = [2,3,4,5,6,7,7,8,9,10];
var debuffInflicted = b.justAddedBD('debuff').length;
if(b.justAddedBD('debuff').contains($dataStates[7])){
  debuffInflicted++;
}

  var d = (Math.random() * 10).toFixed(0);
  b.addState(debuff[d]);
}
</Custom Conclude Effect>
